name: All MLB Team  Ballot - 2021
description:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/l/c/n7MhN2DN

Allow fans to vote for the best players to represent the 2021 All-MLB First and Second Teams

Support voting in English and Spanish

Integration with Baseball Form Foundry to support collection of fan voting.

Send an email to each fan after their first ballot submission to thank them for voting.

Ask a fan to login to their mlb.com account (if it exists) or to register for a new one.
